channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:31 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 21:31 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 21:20 Air alarm to Kirovohrad Oblast follow further reports.
